thread.title: Andrew Keegan's Girlfriend Pregnant With Their First Child
thread.title_full: Andrew Keegan's Girlfriend Pregnant With Their First Child

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Andrew Keegan's Girlfriend Pregnant With Their First Child
text:
Comments The '10 Things I Hate Abut You' actor said they 'look forward to embracing the sacred responsibility of parenthood as well as learning from this spirit'. 
"10 Things I Hate Abut You" and "Party of Five" star Andrew Keegan is going to be a dad. The 36-year-old actor's girlfriend Arista Ilona is pregnant with their first child. "My beloved partner and I are excited to welcome a baby into our lives and our community," Keegan said in a statement to PEOPLE . "We look forward to embracing the sacred responsibility of parenthood as well as learning from this spirit." He added, "Our intention is to raise our child in a co-creative environment where truth and love are foremost. We welcome your thoughts and prayers for this incubating life." A source told the publication that the couple are super excited for the addition. "They really are perfect together," the source said. "He's so excited about this next adventure in his life and bringing a new soul into this world." Keegan and Ilona, who works for Apple, are reportedly yet to find out the baby's sex. Keegan is the founder of Full Circle spiritual center in Venice, California. Undercover agents with the California Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control raided a charity event at Full Circle and confiscated several containers of kombucha. Apparently the hippie elixir had enough alcohol so it couldn't be sold without a license.
